proposals.title: Recruit more women to Government positions
Increase the number of women on the Senate Committee on Defense
Appoint a well-qualified woman to lead the Senate Committee on Gender Equality
Boost the number of women on the Senate Committee on Health and Welfare
Recruit more men to Government positions
Increase the number of men on the Senate Committee on Defense
Appoint a well-qualified man to lead the Senate Committee on Gender Equality
Boost the number of men on the Senate Committee on Health and Welfare

lgbt_social.blurb: Some people argue that same-sex marriages are harmful to society. Other people argue that same-sex marriages are beneficial to society. Still others are somewhere in between.
lgbt_social.title: Same-sex marriage
lgbt_social.min: Same-sex marriages are harmful to society
lgbt_social.max: Same-sex marriages are beneficial to society

lgbt_social.blurb: Some people argue that same-sex couples cannot successfully raise children. Other people argue that same-sex couples can successfully raise children. Still others are somewhere in between.
lgbt_social.title: Raising children
lgbt_social.min: Same-sex couples cannot successfully raise children
lgbt_social.max: Same-sex couples can successfully raise children

lgbt_social.blurb: Some people argue that gay and lesbian people should be encouraged to run for seats in Congress. Other people argue that gay and lesbian people should be discouraged to run for seats in Congress. Still others are somewhere in between.
lgbt_social.title: Running for office
lgbt_social.min: Gay and lesbian people should be discouraged to run for seats in Congress
lgbt_social.max: Gay and lesbian people should be encouraged to run for seats in Congress

lgbt_social.blurb: Some people argue that fewer gay and lesbian people should be considered for government positions. Other people argue that more gay and lesbian people should be considered for government positions. Still others are somewhere in between.
lgbt_social.title: Government positions
lgbt_social.min: Fewer gay and lesbian people should be considered for government positions
lgbt_social.max: More gay and lesbian people should be considered for government positions
